attributes.action: TRAVELLERS AND THE ISSUES MANY CAUSE.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WISH TO SEE CHANGES IN THE LAW TO STOP `TRAVELLERS` BEING ABLE TO SET UP HOME WHERE EVER THEY WISH, AS PER THE ESSEX ISSUE IT SHOULD NEVER TAKE 10 YRS AND SOME 18.5 MILLION OUT OF THE PUBLIC PURSE TO DEAL WITH IT, THEY PULL UP ON COMMONS AND EVEN HAVE CUT CHAINS TO GET INTO PRIVATE LAND, THIS IS WRONG AS IF NORMAL PEOPLE DID THIS THEY WOULD GET ARRESTED AND MOVED YET THEY DO NOT WHICH MAKES A BIAS SYSTEM, MANY MAY BE GOOD BUT A NUMBER SPOIL IT AND GIVE THEM A BAD NAME WITH NOBODY WANTING THEM IN THERE BACK YARD, MAKE THE LAWS EQUAL FOR ALL.
